Saxmundham Mobile Library Route 6

Contact us:

Manager: Helen Hudson and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time

6B Tunstall Tunstall Green 1010 – 1030
6C Tunstall Common 1035 – 1055

6F Easton Village hall 1220 – 1240
6G Letheringham Green 1350 – 1405
6H Marlesford Post Box 1425 – 1450
6I Little Glemham The Lion PH 1500 – 1515
6J Benhall School 1525 – 1545

2016: 20 January, 17 February, 16 March, 13 April, 11 May, 8 June, 6 July, 3 August, 31 August, 28 September, 26 October, 23 November, 21 December
